Author: TreatmentTime
Text: In order of greatest harm reduction:  1. Don’t purge at all 2. Purge hands free  3. Use your hands   Please don’t purge with an implement; the lack of sensitivity combined with the rigidity of most commonly suggested  items puts you at much higher risk of damaging your oesophagus or ending up with a spoon stuck in your airway.   Please be safe and go to a doc to get checked out if you have trouble swallowing, it doesn’t seem to be healing, etc.
